use_cases_desc:
- Slide presenter (presentation on multi-screen)
- Stock viewer (synchronized views)
- Tiled map (display tiling)
- Wall search
- Collaborative document editor
contribution_desc:
Creating meta-applications that turn any unmodified web application into a multi-user and multi-display application.
Bare in mind that the target audience are developers who write middleware that route interactions between browser instances.
use_cases: Finance; Map navigation; Collaborative editing; collaboration
toolkits: NodeJS; JavaScript; socket.io; Objective-C; Browser extension (Chrome)
